definition: intercalary month in the lunar calendar/leap month
intercalary/an extra day or month inserted into the lunar or solar calendar (such as February 29)
moon/month/monthly/CL:個|个[ge4],輪|轮[lun2]

sentences.english: Determines whether the specified month is a leap month.
sentences.chinese: 确定指定的月份是否为闰月。

sentences.english: Calculates the leap month for a specified year.
sentences.chinese: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

sentences.english: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether a month is a leap month.
sentences.chinese: 在衍生类别覆写时，判断某个月份是否为闰月。

sentences.english: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.
sentences.chinese: 计算指定年份和纪元的闰月。

sentences.english: This recurring appointment begins on a leap year.
sentences.chinese: 您的定期约会开始日期是闰月日期。

solar calendar/Western (Gregorian) calendar
Gregorian calendar/solar calendar
the traditional Chinese lunar calendar
old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]
the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
Gregorian calendar/solar calendar
first month of the lunar year
the solar year/the year defined as the period between successive equinoxes
calendar science/calendar system
variant of 曆法|历法 calendar
start of the year
first day of the lunar month
birthday
